name: Christmas Blaster
description:
Christmas Blaster:

Christmas Blaster is an Arcade-type action video game. Santa needs to save Christmas and face creatures and his enemy Krampus with a lot of blast in this fun action-packed game. Inspired by games from the 80's and 90's. It's a dual-stick shooter in the same vein as Robotron: 2084 from 1982, Smash TV from 1990, Hyper Princess Pitch(Daniel Remar) 2011. The game was thought to be faithful in its original art, mechanics, soundtrack and sound effects and has a password system to record progress, faithfully following the games of the time and can also be played by up to 4 players on the same screen.

GamePlay:

Go solo or [you join co-op] and fight in the dark depths of the North Pole, where the dreaded Krampus lives, surviving a challenging and evolving series of assets filled with hand-built dangers and lovable, fearsome enemies. . . Use the classic controller type or switch to dual-stick and have a new experience!
